text: he was not only the uncle to Kim jong-un
but he held very senior positions both
military positions and party positions
he was the guy who was given the
responsibility of overseeing the
transition to power from the father to
the son so really a very key role at the
heart of North Korean politics which
makes what has happened the last few
days so striking those pictures you
might have seen on our coverage of him
being hauled from a party meeting by
armed guards literally holding him up
under his arms and dragging him out it's
the kind of thing that you just don't
see in North Korea and the fact that it
that the country is publicizing is fall
from grace like this is really very
striking here again we're learning about
the military tribunal that took place on
Thursday December the 12th that his
crimes were again listed again in a bit
more detail but being told that he was
appointed to responsible post but abuse
that responsibility formed a faction
attempted to overthrow the state and was
guilty of having political ambitions of
his own and then we're told he was
executed straight after that tribunal
during which he admitted to those crimes
